Reviews.Title: hp laptop
Reviews.Author: tammy a calkins
Reviews.Content: Is as promised and very happy with the product ! Using for home-based business and it runs quick even with all my files and videos.

Reviews.Title: HP Laptop
Reviews.Author: Paul Crislip
Reviews.Content: Works Great am impressed,would recomend it to the amauture comp. wiz I personally don't like Windows 8 but other than that is a good little laptop.

Reviews.Title: It has a problem
Reviews.Author: King Son
Reviews.Content: The laptop was as described, but there was one issue...the mouse pad on it does not work properly...when trying to use the mouse pad it move as if it has a mind of its on....I had to get a wireless mouse for me to use the laptop.....

Reviews.Title: Steer clear
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This computer is exceptionally slow. It has nothing to do with internet connection or WIFI speed. Its is just slow in general with downloading pictures off of an SD or performing tasks as simple as opening new windows. It is not user-friendly at all and has a ton of unnecessary apps on it. If I had the chance to test this laptop out before purchasing, I would have never bought it. I would reccomending spending an extra $100 and getting a real laptop

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: Bought it for someone else and they are not having any issues with it. It is doing the job that it was bought for.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: helen and sean
Reviews.Content: great love it works great every thing works the dvd player works the outputs work the screen works the keyboard works the internet works the wifi works everything works

ProductInfo.Features:
1.3GHz, AMD E-300 Accelerated Processor, Windows 8 (64-bit)
4GB DDR3 SDRAM (1 DIMM), Maximum supported = 8GB
AMD Radeon HD 6310 Discrete-Class graphics with up to 1972MB total graphics memory, 15.6-inch diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit display (1366x768)
500GB 5400RPM hard drive, SuperMulti DVD Burner
HP TrueVision HD Webcam with integrated digital microphone, HDMI
ProductInfo.Name: HP 2000-2B44DX 16-Inch Laptop (1.3GHz, AMD E-300 Accelerated Processor, 4GB, 500GB, DVD Burner, Windows 8)
